name: Roll-Off (GMTK Jam 2022)
description:
It's just a dice, nothing else. Really.

Credits - 
Arthur (Hey! That's me!) - Director and Co-Programmer 
Minimal Llama- Co-Director
Felipe and Kam - Programmers
Choobyshroom and [DRK] Ruben - Art
urdead0 - Sound effects
DOS_t - The absolute banger songs


The game has 6 events regarding the side of the dice.

-Dice teleporting
-Crash
-Math
-Glitch
-Offer
-Ending puzzle

pssht, if you have a doubt, go to your appdata folder (type %appdata% in the file explorer directory box or just use win key + r)
